mission.title: Making WhatsApp Marketing
mission.description1: We believe every business, regardless of size, deserves access to powerful marketing tools. Our mission is to democratize WhatsApp marketing by providing an intuitive, affordable platform that delivers enterprise-level features.
mission.description2: With Whatsway, businesses can connect with their customers on the world's most popular messaging platform, driving engagement, sales, and loyalty like never before.

card.title: Trusted by Industry Leaders
card.description: Join thousands of businesses already growing with Whatsway

story.title: Built by Marketers,
story.description1: Whatsway was born from a simple frustration: existing WhatsApp marketing tools were either too expensive, too complicated, or lacked essential features. As marketers ourselves, we knew there had to be a better way.
story.description2: We started building Whatsway in 2023 with a clear vision: create the most powerful, user-friendly, and affordable WhatsApp marketing platform in the market. Today, we're proud to serve over 10,000 businesses worldwide.
story.description3: Our team combines expertise in marketing automation, software development, and customer success to continuously innovate and deliver value to our users.

hero.title: WhatsApp Marketing
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about WhatsApp Business API, marketing strategies, and best practices to grow your business.

items.title: What is WhatsApp Business API?
items.text: WhatsApp Business API is a powerful platform that allows businesses to communicate with customers at scale. Unlike the regular WhatsApp Business app, the API enables automated messaging, integrations, and advanced features.

items.title: Why Choose WPSaaS?
items.text: WPSaaS provides a user-friendly interface for the WhatsApp Business API, allowing you to create campaigns, automate responses, and track performance without technical complexity.

items.title: Prerequisites
items.text: Before getting started, you'll need: A verified WhatsApp Business API account from Meta, A business phone number, Basic understanding of your target audience

setup.title: Setting Up Your WhatsApp Business API

items.title: Step 1: Get Your Meta API Credentials
items.text: Visit the Meta Business Platform and create a WhatsApp Business API account. You'll receive API credentials including your phone number ID, access token, and webhook URL.

items.title: Step 2: Connect to WPSaaS
items.text: In your WPSaaS dashboard, navigate to Settings > API Configuration. Enter your Meta API credentials and test the connection to ensure everything is working properly.

items.title: Step 3: Verify Your Business
items.text: Complete the business verification process with Meta. This typically involves providing business documents and may take 1-3 business days to complete.

items.title: Campaign Types
items.text: WPSaaS supports various campaign types: Broadcast messages for announcements, Drip campaigns for nurturing leads, Triggered messages based on user actions, Promotional campaigns for sales and offers

items.title: Message Templates
items.text: Create templates in your Meta Business Manager and sync them with Whatsway. Templates can include text, images, videos, and interactive buttons.

items.title: Audience Segmentation
items.text: Segment your audience based on demographics, behavior, purchase history, and engagement levels. This ensures your messages are relevant and improve engagement rates.

items.title: Workflow Automation
items.text: Create automated workflows that respond to customer actions. Examples include welcome sequences for new subscribers, abandoned cart recovery, appointment reminders, and follow-up messages.

items.title: Chatbot Integration
items.text: Deploy AI-powered chatbots to handle common queries, qualify leads, and provide 24/7 customer support. Chatbots can seamlessly hand over to human agents when needed.

items.title: Trigger-Based Messaging
items.text: Set up triggers based on customer behavior, time delays, or external events. This ensures timely and relevant communication with your audience.

items.title: Respect User Privacy
items.text: Always obtain explicit consent before messaging users. Provide clear opt-out options and respect user preferences. Never purchase contact lists or send unsolicited messages.

items.title: Timing and Frequency
items.text: Send messages at appropriate times based on your audience's time zone. Avoid over-messaging - quality over quantity is key. Monitor engagement rates and adjust frequency accordingly.

items.title: Personalization
items.text: Use customer data to personalize messages. Include names, purchase history, and relevant offers. Personalized messages have significantly higher engagement rates.

items.title: Message Categories
items.text: WhatsApp categorizes messages into: Utility (account updates, order confirmations), Authentication (login codes, security alerts), Marketing (promotions, announcements). Each category has specific rules and pricing.

items.title: Template Approval Process
items.text: All message templates must be approved by Meta before use. The approval process typically takes 24-48 hours. Ensure templates follow WhatsApp's content guidelines.

items.title: Quality Rating
items.text: WhatsApp monitors your messaging quality through user feedback and engagement metrics. Maintain a high quality rating to avoid restrictions and ensure deliverability.

quickTips.heading: Quick Tips for Success
quickTips.subtitle: Essential tips to maximize your WhatsApp marketing results

tips.title: Build Your Audience Organically
tips.tip: Focus on quality over quantity. Engaged subscribers are more valuable than large, unengaged lists.

tips.title: Craft Compelling Messages
tips.tip: Keep messages concise, valuable, and action-oriented. Include clear calls-to-action.

tips.title: Monitor Performance
tips.tip: Track delivery rates, read rates, and response rates. Use data to optimize your campaigns.

tips.title: Automate Wisely
tips.tip: Automate routine tasks but maintain human touch for complex interactions.

tips.title: Stay Compliant
tips.tip: Always follow WhatsApp policies and local regulations. Compliance protects your business.

tips.title: Test and Iterate
tips.tip: Continuously test different approaches and optimize based on results.

cta.heading: Ready to Start Your WhatsApp Marketing Journey?
cta.subtitle: Put this guide into action with WPSaaS's powerful platform

hero.title: WhatsApp Marketing
hero.subtitle: Proven strategies and techniques to maximize your WhatsApp marketing success. Learn from industry experts and top-performing campaigns.

bestPractices.expectedImpactDesc: Implementing this practice typically results in measurable improvements to your WhatsApp marketing performance.

quickTips.heading: Quick Success Tips
quickTips.subtitle: Essential reminders for WhatsApp marketing success

tips.title: Quality Over Quantity
tips.tip: Focus on engaged subscribers rather than large lists

tips.title: Timing Matters
tips.tip: Send messages when your audience is most active

tips.title: Be Personal
tips.tip: Use customer data to create relevant experiences

tips.title: Stay Compliant
tips.tip: Always follow WhatsApp policies and local regulations

tips.title: Encourage Interaction
tips.tip: Make conversations two-way for better engagement

tips.title: Test and Optimize
tips.tip: Continuously improve based on performance data

warning.heading: Important Compliance Reminder
warning.description: Always ensure you have explicit consent before messaging customers on WhatsApp. Violating WhatsApp's business policies can result in account restrictions or bans.
points: Use approved message templates for promotional content

cta.heading: Ready to Implement These Best Practices?
cta.subtitle: Start applying these proven strategies with Whatsway today

messaging.title: Keep Messages Concise and Clear
messaging.description: WhatsApp users prefer short, direct messages. Aim for 160 characters or less when possible.
tips: Use bullet points for multiple items

messaging.title: Personalize Your Messages
messaging.description: Use customer data to create personalized experiences that resonate with your audience.
tips: Use dynamic content based on user behavior

messaging.title: Use Rich Media Effectively
messaging.description: Images, videos, and documents can significantly enhance your message impact.

automation.title: Set Up Welcome Sequences
automation.description: Create automated welcome messages for new subscribers to set expectations.

automation.title: Implement Smart Triggers
automation.description: Use behavioral triggers to send relevant messages at the right time.

automation.title: Create Drip Campaigns
automation.description: Nurture leads with a series of automated messages over time.

engagement.title: Encourage Two-Way Conversations
engagement.description: Make your WhatsApp presence interactive to build stronger relationships.

engagement.title: Provide Excellent Customer Support
engagement.description: Use WhatsApp as a customer service channel to resolve issues quickly.
tips: Set up automated responses for common queries
Train support team on WhatsApp etiquette
Use quick replies for faster responses
Escalate complex issues to phone or email

engagement.title: Share Valuable Content
engagement.description: Provide content that educates, entertains, or solves problems for your audience.

compliance.title: Obtain Proper Consent
compliance.description: Always get explicit permission before adding contacts to your WhatsApp list.
tips: Clearly explain what users will receive

compliance.title: Follow WhatsApp Business Policies
compliance.description: Adhere to WhatsApp's terms of service and business policies.
tips: Don't send promotional content without consent

compliance.title: Maintain Data Privacy
compliance.description: Protect customer data and comply with privacy regulations.

timing.title: Send Messages at Optimal Times
timing.description: Time your messages when your audience is most likely to be active.
tips: Avoid early morning and late night messages

timing.title: Respect Frequency Limits
timing.description: Don't overwhelm your audience with too many messages.
tips: Limit to 2-3 messages per week maximum
Allow users to set frequency preferences

timing.title: Plan Seasonal Campaigns
timing.description: Align your messaging with seasonal trends and events.

optimization.title: A/B Test Your Messages
optimization.description: Continuously test different message variations to improve performance.
tips: Test subject lines and opening messages

optimization.title: Monitor Key Metrics
optimization.description: Track important metrics to measure and improve your WhatsApp marketing.

optimization.title: Segment Your Audience
optimization.description: Divide your audience into groups for more targeted messaging.

intro.text: At StyleHub, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you visit and make purchases from our website.

paragraphs.intro: We collect information you directly provide to us:

personalIdentifiers.label: Personal Identifiers:
personalIdentifiers.text: Name, shipping address, email address, and phone number when you place an order or create an account.

paymentInformation.label: Payment Information:
paymentInformation.text: Credit/debit card details or other payment information. Payments are processed securely by our payment processors (e.g., Stripe, PayPal). We do not store full card details on our servers.

orderHistory.label: Order History:
orderHistory.text: A record of the products you purchase.

communication.label: Communication:
communication.text: Any communication you send us, including support requests.

paragraphs.autoIntro: We also automatically collect certain information when you visit our site:

technicalData.label: Technical Data:
technicalData.text: IP address, browser type, device info, and your interactions with our website (e.g., pages viewed), collected via cookies and similar technologies.

howWeUseInfo.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
list: To process and fulfill your orders
To provide invoices, receipts, and order confirmations
To respond to inquiries and provide customer support
To analyze site usage and improve our store
For marketing (only with your consent). You can opt out anytime.

sharingInfo.title: 3. Sharing Your Information
sharingInfo.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We share it only in limited circumstances:

list.label: Service Providers:
list.text: Shipping carriers, payment processors, email platforms, etc.

list.label: Legal Obligations:
list.text: When required by law or legal proceedings.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies
cookies.text: We use cookies to remember preferences, analyze traffic, and improve your shopping experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but some site features may not work properly.

dataRetention.title: 5. Data Retention
dataRetention.text: We retain your information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.intro: You may have rights depending on your location:
list: Access and correct personal information
Request deletion of your data
Opt out of marketing emails anytime
Request your information in a portable format
yourRights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at:

dataSecurity.title: 7. Data Security
dataSecurity.text: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this policy from time to time. Updates will be shown on this page along with a revised "Last Updated" date.

intro.text: Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using the StyleHub website and services. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

generalConditions.title: 1. General Conditions
generalConditions.text: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time. You understand that your content (excluding payment information) may be transferred unencrypted and adapted to technical requirements for transmission.

accountCreation.title: 2. Account Creation & Security
accountCreation.text: You may be required to create an account to access certain features. You are responsible for maintaining confidentiality of your account and password. You must be at least the age of majority in your region to use this site.

productsServices.title: 3. Products & Services
items: We may limit product sales to any person, region, or jurisdiction.
We make every effort to accurately display product images and colors.
All prices are subject to change without notice.

billingOrders.title: 4. Billing & Order Information
billingOrders.text: You agree to provide complete and accurate purchase and account information for all transactions. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order.

thirdPartyLinks.title: 5. Third-Party Links
thirdPartyLinks.text: We are not responsible for third-party content, websites, or services accessed via links on our platform.

userComments.title: 6. User Comments
userComments.text: Any comments or submissions you send to us may be used without restriction. We are not obligated to maintain comments in confidence or compensate you.

prohibitedUses.title: 7. Prohibited Uses
items: Infringing on our intellectual property or others’ rights

disclaimer.title: 8. Disclaimer of Warranties & Liability
disclaimer.text: We do not guarantee uninterrupted, secure, or error-free service. You agree your use of the service is at your sole risk. All services are provided “as is” without warranties.

indemnification.title: 9. Indemnification
indemnification.text: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless StyleHub and its employees and partners from any claims arising from your breach of these Terms.

severability.title: 10. Severability
severability.text: If any provision in these Terms is found unenforceable, the remaining provisions remain valid and enforceable.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.text: These Terms remain effective unless terminated by either party. Obligations before termination survive.

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law
governingLaw.text: These Terms are governed by the laws of India.

changes.title: 13. Changes to These Terms
changes.text: We may update these Terms at any time by posting changes on this page. It is your responsibility to review them periodically.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
paragraphs: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our service.
This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, the types of cookies we use, and how you can control your cookie preferences.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.intro: We use cookies for several purposes:
list: To ensure our website functions properly
To remember your login status and preferences
To analyze website traffic and usage patterns
To improve our services and user experience
To provide personalized content and features
To measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.text: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility. You cannot opt out of these cookies.
essential.examples: Examples: Session cookies, authentication cookies, load balancing cookies

performance.title: Performance Cookies
performance.text: These cookies collect information about how visitors use our website, such as which pages are visited most often and if users get error messages. This helps us improve our website's performance.
performance.examples: Examples: Google Analytics, page load time tracking, error reporting

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.text: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make and provide enhanced, more personal features. They may be set by us or by third-party providers whose services we have added to our pages.
functional.examples: Examples: Language preferences, theme settings, form data

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.text: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements and measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.
marketing.examples: Examples: Facebook Pixel, Google Ads, retargeting cookies

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.intro: We may use third-party services that set cookies on your device. These services include:
list: Google Analytics: For website analytics and performance monitoring
Intercom: For customer support and live chat functionality
Stripe: For payment processing and fraud prevention
Facebook: For social media integration and advertising
thirdPartyCookies.outro: These third parties have their own privacy policies and cookie policies. We recommend reviewing their policies to understand how they use cookies.

cookieDuration.title: Cookie Duration
cookieDuration.intro: Cookies can be either session cookies or persistent cookies:
list: Session Cookies: These are temporary cookies that are deleted when you close your browser
Persistent Cookies: These remain on your device for a set period or until you delete them manually
cookieDuration.extra: The duration of persistent cookies varies depending on their purpose, typically ranging from 30 days to 2 years.

managingCookies.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
managingCookies.intro: You have several options for managing cookies:

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings
browserSettings.text: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can:
list: Block all cookies
Block third-party cookies
Delete existing cookies
Set up notifications when cookies are being sent

consentManager.title: Cookie Consent Manager
consentManager.text: When you first visit our website, you'll see a cookie consent banner that allows you to accept or decline different types of cookies. You can change your preferences at any time by clicking the "Cookie Settings" link in our footer.

optOutLinks.title: Opt-Out Links
optOutLinks.intro: You can opt out of specific third-party cookies:

impactDisabling.title: Impact of Disabling Cookies
impactDisabling.intro: While you can disable cookies, please note that doing so may affect your experience on our website:
list: Some features may not work properly
You may need to re-enter information more frequently
Personalized content and recommendations may not be available
We may not be able to remember your preferences

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
paragraphs: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website.
We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we use cookies.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us at:
contact.address: 123 Business Ave, Suite 100, San Francisco, CA 94105
